question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-fullnode/src/stream_coordinator.rs] [Function: process_next_batch()] [Panic on Task Failure] Can task join failure in futures::future::try_join_all() cause panic at line 189-192, terminating the coordinator and losing in-flight transaction data?
